reviewText: I love and admire the human body, makes no difference which sex.  This was NOT a workout DVD.  It wasn't porn since there weren't men doing things with the women.  The women had some touching with each other.  Much striking of poses with two women.  EVERY part of the anatomy was shown - spread-eagled jumping on the stability ball.  It is mildly entertaining.  Some of the breasts just couldn't be totally real.  Probably most men wouldn't care if they were or not.  I wouldn't have minded any of it IF it had actually BEEN a workout but it was a waste of money for me.
summary: NOT a workout DVD!  This must be for lonely guys - all is shown
Title: Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout

reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect on this one, because I thought it was going to be just like "Totally Nude Warm-Up & Stretch", which was OK, but I found that one slightly boring because it just showed the girls doing their routines and not much else... you got the feeling you're just watching an exercise video in which the girls were too lazy to get dressed or something. However, I was pleasantly surprised with this video, which takes itself far less seriously; the producers seem to realize that you're probably watching it more for the T&A; than to get tips about how to exercise, so they cut you in a little on the fun by having a female narrator (unfortunately perhaps, you don't get to see her) who jokes around here and there about what the benefits are for each part of the workout (for example, when the girls do a few knee bends after working out on the balance balls she says it helps to "air out your cooch"... Also you get to see the girls horsing around a little during breaktime, some bloopers, etc... So I found it to be funny as well as erotic to look at. You have some awesomely beautiful girls here like Amy Ried, Persia Pele, Karlie Montana, etc. Check it out -- you won't be sorry...My only gripe is that for some reason there was a glitch the main menu that made it difficult or impossible to jump to a particular scene, but other than that, this is a fine production, very original and really hot too!
summary: Hey guys, this video is a hoot! Get it NOW!
Title: Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout

reviewText: This is actually a very fun video to watch.  I don't think it's truly intended for participating along with, although I'm sure you could try if you really wanted to.  It's also the THIRD in a series.  The other TWO before it were the similarly titled, "Totally Nude Warm-Up & Stretch," and the "Totally Nude Pilates."  I've not seen either, so I couldn't tell you how they compare.  Maybe soon.Totally Nude Warm-Up & Stretch,Totally Nude PilatesI can say, though, that FIVE of the actresses in THIS video - Carli Banks, Amy Ried, Karlie Montana, Celeste Star and Tanya James - were also in "Totally Nude Warm-Up & Stretch."  So if you like their performances here, you'll probably enjoy them in the other video as well.  And vice-versa.  The only "new" actress in this release is Persia Pele who brings a little Middle Eastern flair to the team.Lastly, I might also mention that ALL of the girls are also adult film actresses; which makes them, I think, much more ATTRACTIVE and EXPRESSIVE while NUDE than what you might experience from totally amateur performers.  And they're all really cute - with very nice figures, indeed.  And all are nicely trimmed.As you would expect, all of the exercises are done Totally Nude, like duh.  The women appear against a white seamless background with colorful blue exercise balls and pretty pink exercise mats as accoutrements.  An energetic tune is always playing along.  The girls are smiling - but generally taking their workouts very seriously.  The `happiest' babe in the group, though - is Celeste - who brightens the room whenever she appears.The ladies are always shown in pairs, either doing the same routine simultaneously - or in reverse, like a mirror image.  Think duets - of synchronized swimming - and you'll be close.  The exercises start out simple - to allow you to appreciate the women's visual splendor.  They get more strenuous and acrobatic towards the movie's end and also a bit more revealing.  There's plenty of frontal nudity in this video as well as views both top and back.The first section of the exercises is called "Warm-Up Playtime," where the girls' activities are more unstructured, and the routines are much simpler.  The heart of the video is the "Sexy Ball Workout" which takes up about 80% of the time.  Here, the girls assume a variety of poses and activities - which gives your EYES their most serious work.  The last portion of the film is called the -  "Body, Curves & Form" - which is more of a highlights and close-up reel of . . . the video's best parts (pun intended).There's an entertaining -- outtake and a live-action-photo-shoot intermission -- at the movie's mid-point, to give the girls a rest.  The film also repeats itself automatically - to make it easier to watch this release in the background.  I just leave it on while I'm also working out, cleaning or cooking.What you choose to do while watching this video is really up to you and I probably don't need to know.  To conclude, if you're looking for a physically relaxing, yet visually stimulating film featuring very pretty, shapely and expressive nude actresses, then "Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout" may be just the tonic for you.  Enjoy.
summary: The Only Exercise You'll Get - Is with Your Eyes !!  Seriously?
Title: Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout

reviewText: I'm disappointed with this video. It has the same video quality as the Nude Aerobics video from 20 years ago. Pretty much the same format too. If you liked that one, you'll probably like this one just as much. When the disc got to about 40 minutes the picture began to break up, pixilate?? or whatever it's called. Did this for the next 8-9 minutes.It was okay, not great.....save your money.
Title: Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout

reviewText: If there was ever a highly energetic fun workout video, this is it!!!, all the models are easy on the eyes, especially Carly Banks & Karlie Montana, the music is highly energetic & fits the workouts perfectly, I don't know which I like better, the beautiful women or the cool music...a great combination of both!!....all the women are totally nude...an over the top fun DVD.....Highly Recommend this one!
Title: Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout
